update movel_tvdata set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `alias` = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mainstar = #{mainstar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, director = #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `year` = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param = #{param,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sitename = #{sitename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tvtype = #{tvtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, siteurl = #{siteurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, movel_status = #{movel_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seach_name = #{seach_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seach_rname = #{seach_rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seach_aname = #{seach_aname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT uuid as uuid, name as name,director as director,mainstar as mainstar,image as image,tvtype as tvtype,type as type,area as area,year as year,introduction as introduction,siteurl as siteurl from movel_tvdata ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3
SELECT playurl as playurl from movel_tvnums WHERE tvuuid_id = #{id} order by num asc limit 1
SELECT playurl as playurl from movel_tvnums WHERE tvuuid_id = #{id} order by num asc limit 1

SELECT uuid, `name`, `alias`, mainstar, director, `type`, area, `year`, site, image, param, sitename, tvtype, siteurl, createtime, updatetime, id, movel_status, introduction, plot from movel_tvdata where seach_name like '最新热门m147-%'

SELECT uuid, `name`, `alias`, mainstar, director, `type`, area, `year`, site, image, param, sitename, tvtype, siteurl, createtime, updatetime, id, movel_status, introduction, plot from movel_tvdata where seach_aname like concat(#{type},'%')
SELECT count(uuid) as total ,tvtype as tvtype from movel_tvdata where sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/' GROUP BY tvtype
SELECT id as id, name as name from movel_tvdata where sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/' order by param limit 10
SELECT distinct type from movel_tvdata where tvtype = #{tvtype} and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
SELECT uuid from movel_tvdata where name = #{name} and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/' limit 1
SELECT uuid, name FROM movel_tvdata WHERE name = ( SELECT name FROM movel_tvdata WHERE uuid = #{id}) GROUP BY sitename
SELECT uuid, name, site FROM movel_tvdata WHERE seach_rname like '轮播m147-%' and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
SELECT uuid, name FROM movel_tvdata WHERE seach_name like '最新热门m147-%' and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
SELECT uuid, name FROM movel_tvdata WHERE seach_aname like concat('热门',#{type},'m147-%') and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
mapper.update: update movel_tvdata set seach_rname = #{name}, site = #{url} where uuid = #{id} and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
update movel_tvdata set seach_name = #{name} where uuid = #{id} and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
update movel_tvdata set seach_name = '' where uuid = #{id} and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
update movel_tvdata set seach_rname = '' where uuid = #{id} and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
update movel_tvdata set seach_aname = '' where uuid = #{id} and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
mapper.select: SELECT id, uuid, `name`, mainstar, director, `type`, area, `year`, site, image, param, sitename, tvtype, siteurl, introduction, plot from movel_tvdata where seach_rname like '轮播m147-%' and sitename = 'https://img.ylzy1.com/'
